title: I'm having a technical issue
body:
.Hello,

I Asked some of your Agents on LiveChat that how i can download the game with pause and resume
So he gave me a MegaSync Download link it was about 8.5 GB i downloaded them and i launched the game 
Of course, i downloaded it in 125 hrs so  as i said i launched the game and it started to Scanning about 2950 files or something and then finished scanning and started downloading 3GB Wtf?
I can't download 3gb at once i have poor internet connection so please help i was waiting so long to play it please find a solution don't tell me you have to download the 3gb get me a solution
Thanks in advance

replies.body: We don't have recommendations beyond the normal download link, so your specialist may be providing instructions specific to your case.  You should hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can continue to help you out with this directly.
Ok thanks, i did that but the download link was from an agent which is trusted and working
